A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found the movie completely enjoyable and loved it.  I loved the character development of all but Rose who I felt was a little unnecessary in the movie.  Action was great and the comedy was used to make all of the characters feel more humanized.  I agree with the reviews that mention there is a bit of a plot hole in the way the movie was moved forward\, but I am classifying it as a McGuffin much like the Death Star.
